price: 1. Ne s’est-il pas écoulé un temps très long durant lequel l’homme ne méritait même pas d’être cité ?
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: hal atā ʿalā al-insāni ḥīnun mina al-dahri lam yakun shayan madhkūran
